abstract: The closest Coast Guard base to a proposed site for offshore drilling in the Arctic is in Kodiak, Ak., more than 1,000 miles to the south.
snippet: The closest Coast Guard base to a proposed site for offshore drilling in the Arctic is in Kodiak, Ak., more than 1,000 miles to the south.
lead_paragraph: As I noted in my article in Wednesday's paper, Shell Oil has received several preliminary permits to begin drilling exploratory wells off the Arctic coast of Alaska next summer even as foes of drilling there argue that the severe conditions -- ice, darkness, brutal storms -- will make it impossible to properly respond to a spill or other problem.

headline.main: A Coast Guard Challenge: Arctic Drilling
